channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Intuitive Custom Post Order
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Intuitive Custom Post Order

item.title: CVE-2022-4385|2024-08-03T01:41:44.445Z -- unknown -- intuitive%20custom%20post%20order
item.description: The Intuitive Custom Post Order WordPress plugin before 3.1.4 does not check for authorization in the update-menu-order ajax action, allowing any logged in user (with roles as low as Subscriber) to update the menu order

item.title: CVE-2022-4386|2024-08-03T01:41:44.404Z -- unknown -- intuitive%20custom%20post%20order
item.description: The Intuitive Custom Post Order WordPress plugin before 3.1.4 lacks CSRF protection in its update-menu-order ajax action, allowing an attacker to trick any user to change the menu order via a CSRF attack
